WEBINAR Executive Insights on the Present and Future State of Virtual Care
December 8 | 1 p.m. Eastern Image Businesswoman showing doctor something on tablet 92% of hospitals and health systems have had a telehealth program in place for over a year, and 61% plan to expand their programs.
In this webinar led by Tony Burke, SVP of Partnerships and Innovation for Hospitals and Health Systems, we’ll share fresh findings like this and more from the 2022 Telehealth Benchmark Survey.
Register now <[[https://go.beckershospitalreview.com/hit/-executive-insights-on-the-present-and-future-state-of-telehealth?utm_source=teladoc-health&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=survey-results-webinar]]>
Hear the latest insights from hospital and health system executives on: The maturity of virtual care, system-wide use cases and utilization What top hospital leaders look for in a virtual care solution How partnering with an industry leader can reveal unparalleled opportunities The importance of integration, clinician adoption and secure operational support in improving access to care
The 2022 Benchmark Survey was conducted in association with Becker’s Hospital Review to gauge critical trends related to virtual care enablement directly from industry leaders.
